title: Cocaïne, Prison & Likes: La Vraie Histoire D'Isabelle
overview: In 2016, Isabelle Lagacé and Mélina Roberge were arrested for importing cocaine aboard a luxury cruise ship in Australia. It became an international news story. Porn stars, escorts, influencers, cocaine babes: the media didn't hold back on the labels. Halfway around the world, Isabelle spent more than four years behind bars. How did a young woman, who could be the girl next door, get involved in an international drug trafficking syndicate? In this mini-series, Isabelle finally breaks her silence and shares her version of the story that captivated the world's attention.
